name: Leg Swings (Forward-Backward)
what: Loosens hip flexors and hamstrings for full stride range.
feel: Smooth swinging through the hip, from thigh to calf.

name: Leg Swings (Side-to-Side)
what: Mobilizes hips laterally and activates stabilizers.
feel: Controlled sweep across the body activating outer glutes.

name: High Knees
what: Drives heart rate and engages hip flexors and core.
feel: Uplifting knee drive and rapid rhythm.

name: Butt Kicks
what: Warms up hamstrings and promotes leg recovery mechanics.
feel: Snappy flick behind the legs with upright posture.

name: Lunge with Overhead Reach
what: Opens hip flexors and activates posterior chain.
feel: Deep stretch through the hip and side body.

name: Fast Ankling
what: Prepares ankle stiffness and rhythm for ground contact.
feel: Quick taps with light rebound in the calves.

name: Glute Activation Walks
what: Engages glutes and lateral stabilizers to control alignment.
feel: Tension in the outer hips with controlled steps.

name: A-Skips
what: Reinforces proper form and midfoot strike mechanics.
feel: Rhythmic hopping with knee lift and bounce.

name: Open the Gate / Close the Gate
what: Mobilizes the hip capsule in rotation, prepping stride flow.
feel: Circular movement deep in the hip sockets.

name: Strides
what: Builds neuromuscular sharpness for race pace readiness.
feel: Controlled acceleration to 80â€“90% effort with smooth rhythm.
